title: What are coincidences? Do they really exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Greetings Karyn, I’m not a believer in coincidences; I believe everything happens as it should and when it should. We all are actors on a stage, playing a part in the play directed and created by ourselves as we experience our ‘Life’s Dramas;’ each actor has his/her role to play, as their entrances and exits happen when they should. There is an unseen orchestration going on behind the scenes, which the audience is totally aware of, in order for our ‘Life’s Dramas’ to unfold with impeccable timing.
